tool_description: Embounce is an email validator API that helps to validate your email list for the best mail delivery and Return on Investment.
name: Embounce
title: Embounce

api_list.name: email / addressToVerify
api_list.description: This end point will return weather the given email address is valid or not in boolean.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://embounce.p.rapidapi.com/zandora.space@gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "embounce.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://embounce.p.rapidapi.com/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "embounce.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
